trans-unit.source: Base type for conditions used in filtering when searching for elements in the UI Automation tree.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄中搜尋項目時，用於篩選之條件的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Condition" /> that always evaluates to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示永遠評估為 <see langword="false" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Condition" />。

trans-unit.source: This condition exists only for symmetry with <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition.TrueCondition>.
It will never enable a match with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, and it cannot usefully be combined with any other condition.
trans-unit.target: 它會永遠不會啟用相符[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素，而且它無法提供實用的用途與結合任何其他條件。

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Condition" /> that always evaluates to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示永遠評估為 <see langword="true" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Condition" />。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition.TrueCondition> is used to retrieve all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements within the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition.TrueCondition> utiliza para recuperar todos[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]指定的範圍內的項目。
